question: 売り上げ
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>sell</kanji>ing that you've raised (<ja>上げ</ja>) is the <vocabulary>amount sold</vocabulary> or number of <vocabulary>sales</vocabulary>. Think of a graph going upward, where it's rising as you sell more things.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading for <ja>売</ja> is the one you learned with <ja>売る</ja>. The reading for <ja>上げ</ja> is the same as the reading for <ja>上げる</ja>, a word you learned previously. If you know those two separate things, you should be able to combine them into one awesome vocab thing.
